title: Evermore: The Rylakian Heir
description: When Snow White escaped the Huntsman,and spoiled her stepmother's murderous plan, she found herself in the magical Kingdom of Lonstas, surrounded by Vampires, Werewolves, Elves...all manner of magical creatures.But will these powerful friends be enough to save her from her stepmother's wrath.....
author: Caroline Metzlaff
